required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Observational Long-term Safety Registry of Multiple Sclerosis Patients Who Have Participated in Cladribine Clinical Trials
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Observational Long-term Safety Registry of Multiple Sclerosis Patients Who Have Participated in Cladribine Clinical Trials

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective Observational Long-term Safety Registry of Multiple Sclerosis Patients who Have Participated in Cladribine Clinical Trials

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with serious adverse drug reactions (SADRs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to the end of the registry, which is planned for 2018, or 8 years after the subject's first enrolment into a cladribine clinical trial, whichever occurs first

primary_outcome.measure: Time to resolution of lymphopenia, among registry participants with persistent lymphopenia
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to the end of the registry, which is planned for 2018, or 8 years after the subject's first enrolment into a cladribine clinical trial, whichever occurs first

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with all Adverse Events (AEs) in the "Blood and Lymphatic System Disorders" System Organ Class (SOC) and in the "Neoplasms Benign, Malignant, and Unspecified" SOC
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to the end of the registry, which is planned for 2018, or 8 years after the subject's first enrolment into a cladribine clinical trial, whichever occurs first

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to the end of the registry, which is planned for 2018, or 8 years after the subject's first enrolment into a cladribine clinical trial, whichever occurs first

arm_group.description: This is an observational study. Subjects who had already participated in the cladribine clinical trials will be observed.

intervention.description: This is an observational study. Subjects who had already participated in the cladribine clinical trials will be observed.

study_pop.textblock: Subjects with Multiple Sclerosis and had already participated in Sponsor oral cladribine clinical development trials

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Prior enrollment into selected oral cladribine clinical trials as of randomization to either study drug or placebo, once participation in the clinical trial has ended
- Written informed consent was given
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who cannot be reached by telephone
- Subjects unable to answer the registry questionnaires and who do not have a next of kin or caregiver able to answer the registry questionnaires
- Subjects who - either during the lag interval or subsequently - enter an interventional study

overall_official.affiliation: EMD Serono Inc., an affiliate of Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany
